==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=强龙不压地头蛇|type=11113}}

===Etymology===
Literally: A strong dragon cannot suppress a local snake.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=qiáng lóng bù yā dìtóushé
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Even a powerful person cannot defeat a local gangster.
